Visually impaired I am a Volunteer AI Welcome! Welcome to angel eyes, if you are a Visually impaired please say yes for video call say up, for artificial intelligence Service say down Calling... Username Password Confirm Your Password Password error empty field E-mail Your e-mail Login Logout Register About Offers Gifts Volunteer Added Login Failed Login Succed Register Failed Register Succed Classifier could not be initialized Angel Eyes vocal feedback initialized Angel Eyes vocal feedback shutting down DONE ERROR CANCEL OK No Yes Dialog Rate Are you satisfied? Angel eyes aims to empower visually impaired people to live more independently, and have more self confidence in their ability of dealing with the unknown. Let\'s help them have their own guarding angel eyes !
